markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Alchemist's Damper](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1581)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** attached to a  firearm  with the  kickback  weapon trait

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attack with the affixed firearm

**Requirement** You're an expert with the affixed firearm.
</row>

</column>

---

A glass tube of mercury is contained within this golden clasp that's fitted in front of a firearm's trigger. On the triggering Strike, the mercury turns briefly to gold, reducing the effect of recoil, allowing you to ignore the circumstance penalty of the attached weapon's kickback weapon trait.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Alchemist's Damper
requirement: You're an expert with the affixed firearm.
requirement_markdown: You're an expert with the affixed firearm.
